Author: popox
Title: 🔹[ANN][ICO]🔹GLN 🔹 Gaming Reimagined 🔹
Body: ICO Analysis: Game Loot Network Published on July 13, 2018 By Joshua Larson  Verdict Game Loot says they will be a one-stop shop for all of gaming; play, purchase and design. They are asking for a lot of money, $41 million just from private investors. For this type of money, one would expect a way better sales pitch. The whitepaper is not detailed, and the team seems incapable of accomplishing their goals. Actually, there is a very strong possibility this entire project is a scam, and the founders of Bithead, PlayBrains, BrainCloud and GameL oot are now doing an ICO. Not to produce what they promise, but to get filthy rich off sloppy investors.  Risks     Private Sale Hard Cap: US $41,600,000.00.  This is confirmed real. -1     Private sale contributors have to be accredited investors and receive a 200% bonus. -1     Their partnerships aren’t real partnerships. They are mostly past businesses founded by the same team as Game Loot.-2     LOOT tokens not sold in the private and public sale will be divided equally among each of the 300 days for the daily blind auction. -1     CEO Doug Kinney is not being honest with his employment history. -1     They claim to have done extensive platform beta testing that yielded more than $5 million in revenue over just 7 months. However, they seem to be lying. When asked to provide evidence of this as well as other claims they made in the one pager. We were blocked from their Telegram, and our questions deleted as if we had never even been there. -1     A Google search “Gamelootnetwork is a scam” returned plenty of damning evidence. This guy Ethan provides a very detailed investigation and concludes this is indeed a scam. -4  https://ethanvanderbuilt.com/2018/01/31/game-loot-network-scam-yes-opinion/  Growth Potential     They plan on “accommodating infinite expansion” into VR and everything that comes with it.+2     Their roadmap is long and detailed, extends all the way into 2021. It seems like empty promises, but if by some miracle, this project is real, it will be pretty cool. +2  Disposition Stay away from this one. -5/10 (that’s right, negative 5).  Investment Details     Platform: Ethereum.     Symbol: LOOT     Total Supply: 600,000,000 (600m)     Price: $0.35     Soft Cap: $5 million     Hard Cap: private presale= $41.6m . total cap: TBD     Private Sale: Accredited Investors only, apply here. (ends 31 July 2018 ) Phase 1     200% Bonus (Buy 1, Get 2 Free)     Crowd Sale:  Begins September 1, 2018 Proof: https://hacked.com/ico-analysis-game-loot-network/

Title: 🔹[ANN][ICO]🔹GLN 🔹 Gaming Reimagined 🔹
Body: I honestly feel this ICO is a scam.  No About Us page with company information, just a paragraph of generic text and some screenshots that could be anything.  Google searches of the "Team" on the front page don't show up anything outside bounty shilling. Cannot locate any Youtube videos with any of the team members mentioning this ICO.  Office addresses could be anything, many scam ICOs use fake office addresses.  The team needs an actual video with some of its members speaking in it. Also 50M soft cap? With the little interest here that almost certainly won't be reached.

Author: gamelootnetwork
Title: 🔹[ANN][ICO]🔹GLN 🔹 Gaming Reimagined 🔹
Body: Thank you I think we all wish such a platform was available when we were younger! Yes, correct. So that we could reward users engagement on the platform, we developed our own utility token 'LOOT'. This allows certain engagements and interactions to trigger crypto coin allotments. The blockchain network then tracks these actions and rewards users 'LOOT', for example inviting friends.

Title: 🔹[ANN][ICO]🔹GLN 🔹 Gaming Reimagined 🔹

Author: Ratko1922
Title: 🔹[ANN][ICO]🔹GLN 🔹 Gaming Reimagined 🔹
Body: Hi there, Thank you for taking interest in our project. Loot land is going to be a bit different from Decentraland. Basically, the focus will be on gaming, so all social media and other content will be geared towards building and evolving Loot land ecosystem, enabling us to get a large number of players and developers working towards the same goal - a completely new approach to gaming.  Hope this answers your question. Let me know if you need anything, we are happy to answer any question that pops up.  Ratko

Author: Ratko1922
Title: 🔹[ANN][ICO]🔹GLN 🔹 Gaming Reimagined 🔹
Body: Of course, when the platform is completely moved to Blockchain, we will reopen the beta for the certain number of players, which can help us improve it and make it even more appealing to our growing community.

Author: Ratko1922
Title: 🔹[ANN][ICO]🔹GLN 🔹 Gaming Reimagined 🔹
Body: Hi again, I have missed your question somehow in all this rush around the ICO. The answer is simple - Blockchain will help us do it. Every submission will be recorded, so nobody will be able to steal someone else's property and ideas will remain safe as well, as long as you submit them on the Blockchain. Hope this helps.  Ratko

Author: Ratko1922
Title: 🔹[ANN][ICO]🔹GLN 🔹 Gaming Reimagined 🔹
Body: Hi there, Can you please elaborate? We are a well-established business, the beta has been tested and we have raised over $6 million during that period. Now we are doing an ICO, following all regulations and industry standards. If you have any concerns or questions, feel free to ask us, we are here to provide answers and help everyone understand what we are doing, how and when.  Thank you and have a nice day!  Ratko
